description: An extremely pleasant bitter, straw coloured beer with a terrific fresh, hoppy aroma.
name: Hopback Summer Lightning

description: Clear deep golden colour, moderate white head. Aroma of malts and toffee, hints of caramel and earthy hops. The flavour is first malty but not very sweet, followed by fruity and earthy hops.
name: Kirkstall Dissolution

description: This contemporary IPA explodes with amazing hop harvest aromas, packs in big tropical and citrus hop flavours before a crisp, refreshing finish.
name: Oakham Green Devil

description: A simple combination of pale malt and American Cascade hops result in a crisp, dry and refreshing pale ale with aromas of citrus fruit and balanced bitterness.
name: Ossett Silver King

description: Light and easy-drinking, itâ€™s a beer that showcases the floral and citrus fruit aromas of the Cascade hop, grown in the Yakima Valley in Washington State.
name: Roosters Yankee Pale Ale

description: A powerfully authentic, citrusy IPA. If a job's worth doing, make it a proper job.
name: St Austell Proper Job

description: Brewed with a huge amount of US hops that provide a fantastic experience of grapefruit, lemon and tropical fruit with an enticing bitterness. Balanced with a great English malt base of Low Colour Maris Otter from Norfolk that helps keep the beer light and drinkable with enough sweetness to keep it all in harmony.
name: Thornbridge Jaipur

description: English base malt and two big American hops giving orange and citrus flavours.
name: Fixed Wheel Chain Reaction

description: Subtle malt and floral notes are matched splendidly with citrus hop, rounded off with a slightly dry finish.
name: Dancing Duck Ay Up

description: A real mosaic of fruity and floral characteristics. Uses a base of light malts to really let those bold hop flavours and aromas shine.
name: Adnams Mosaic Pale Ale

description: A classic traditional best bitter, glowing copper and full of malt character, balanced by some fantastic fruity British hops.
name: Magpie Best Bitter

description: Attractive mahogany, bringing forth flavours of honey and caramel with just a light bitterness in the finish to keep it balanced.
name: Thornbridge Lord Marples Bitter

description: A well balanced bitter. Uses wide range of malt to give this a rich depth and abundance of flavour. Offset this with a soft lingering bitterness.
name: Blue Monkey Primate

description: Strong dark porter that combines the sweetness of plums with the hoppy flavour of a porter.
name: Titanic Plum Porter

description: The aroma has roast coffee, biscuit and slight hints of molasses. Theres a taste of chocolate, nut and coffee with a rounded sweetness and smooth, velvety malt mouthfeel. It finishes with a low level of bitterness to balance the sweet mocha malt profile.
name: Exmoor Oatmeal Stout

description: Nutty, deeply rich and satisfying ruby ale.
name: Rudgate Ruby Mild

description: Gasping Goose is a complex medium cider with a slightly tannic finish.
name: Newton Court Gasping Goose

description: A hazy, dry, oak aged cider from Somerset.
name: Thatchers Stan's Traditional

description: Lukas is straw blonde, full-bodied yet sparklingly light. This Helles exudes a subtle, freshly bakes bread maltiness, balanced with an elegant noble hop aroma.
name: Thornbridge Lukas
